welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kaizu, the charming city known for its breathtaking natural beauty and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to immerse yourself in our vibrant city and discover all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Komaki AFB Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Komaki AFB Airport is responsible for handling all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chu-Bu Centrair International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost carriers and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require reconnection after a certain amount of time.
